title: Akram Canteen
content: LLR's Night Canteen, serving 12 tables at once.
Prices are higher here as compared to other night canteens.
This canteen is primarily famous for it's non-veg dishes.
This place also has a variety of cold-drinks and packed snacks available.
Orders might take time in case of huge rush, the canteen may even temporarily stop taking orders in case there's a large number of people.
Not recommended during rains, as there's little to no cover.
